title: 669: BITCOIN PRICE CAN SKYROCKET TO $1 MILLION PER BTC ADMITS PETER SCHIFF IN REGRET FOR NOT BUYING ANY!!
description:
Full-time Bitcoin troll Peter Schiff acknowledged that the BTC price could have another impressive leg up by reaching $100,000 or even $1 million per BTC.

“Clearly, I wish I had bought bitcoin when I first heard about it – that was a keen mistake. Could have I put $100,000 in it – yeah, I could have. I mean, I put $100,000 in other things that turned out poorly.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
